PowLerpAngle(float, float, float, float)

Framerate independent lerp. Uses MathF.Pow (very expensive). ExpDecayLerp should be used if possible.

public static float PowLerpAngle(float from, float to, float remainder, float dt)

Parameters

from float

Starting Value

to float

Target Value

remainder float

How much fraction should remain after 1 second

dt float

Delta Time

Returns
